alert.note: Alert for Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 9:15PM CDT until May 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Starr County in Deep South Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 914 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near El Sauz, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Rosita, El Sauz, Rio Grande City Municipal Airport, Los Alvarez, Los Garzas, Los Villareales and Rio Grande City--roma. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 814 and 816. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
